name: Potion Panic (SiIverGoId)
description:
Combine colored potions to clear the screen and raise your score! 

Invalid Potion combinations result in an explosion. 3 explosions is game over.

Score with massive combos by combining potions one-after-another.

Challenge yourself to get as high of a score as possible by maximizing combos before the game speeds up!

Credits:

Programmer - SilverGold

Music - DogsMagic
